message.name: ERR_VERIFICATION_GROUP_FV_IMPACT_ACTIVE_VERIFICATION_REQUIREMENTS
message.locale: The removal of this Verification Group may impact one or more verification requirements.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATION_GROUP_ITEM_UTILIZATION_FV_MODIFY_IMPACT_ACTIVE_VERIFICATION_REQUIREMENTS
message.locale: The removal of this Verification Item Utilization may impact one or more verification requirements.
The removal of this Verification Item Utilisation may impact one or more verification requirements.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATION_GROUP_ITEM_UTILIZATION_FV_TODATE_LATER_FROMDATE
message.locale: The To Date must be later than the From Date.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATION_GROUP_FV_AT_LEAST_ONE_ITEM_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: At least one Verification Item must be selected.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATION_GROUP_FV_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This Verification Group record has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATION_GROUP_ITEM_UTILIZATION_FV_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This Verification Group Item utilization record has already been cancelled.
This Verification Group Item utilization record has already been canceled.
